Job/Team Function: The DA is Her Majesty’s Ambassador’s senior adviser on defence issues, and as Head of the BDS-US has responsibility for all military and civilian MoD personnel located both within the Embassy and in 34 states across the USA.

Name: N/D
Job/Team Function: Produce Defence Operational Lessons and conduct Audit of Defence capability

Name: N/D
Job/Team Function: International acquisition issues within MOD and wider Government & US, FR, the EU (EDA) and NATO; US/UK Defence Trade Treaty; UK-France Higher Level Working Group

Name: N/D
Job/Team Function: Delivery of global military strategic planning; development of security co-operation, conflict prevention and security sector reform in the Levant, Sub-Saharan Africa, South and South East Asia; recruit, direct and support worldwide Defence Attaché and Loan Service network

Name: N/D
Job/Team Function: Delivery of global military strategic planning; development of security co-operation, conflict prevention and security sector reform in the Levant, Sub-Saharan Africa, South and South East Asia; recruit, direct and support worldwide Defence Attaché and Loan Service network

Name: N/D
Job/Team Function: Shape, evaluate, arbitrate and advise on the delivery of current and future integrated capability in order to enable the UK to plan, prepare for and execute joint and combined operations.

Name: N/D
Job/Team Function: Policy advice directed at promoting the UK’s security interests through NATO and the EU and with European partners.

Name: N/D
Job/Team Function: Lead on Cyber Policy and Plans; Executive for Defence Cyber Security Programme; OCSIA and Agency engagement

Name: Scholefield, Susan
Job Title: Director General Human Resources & Corporate Services
Job/Team Function: DGHRCS is the MOD's Civilian Workforce Process Owner (responsible for the development of MOD's corporate Civilian Workforce Strategy and policies to ensure MoD has sufficient, capable and motivated civilian personnel to deliver Defence outputs) and is owner of the People Pay and Pensions Agency.

Name: Andy Gray
Job/Team Function: DCP is responsible for delivering the Corporate HR element of MOD’s Civilian HR structure.

Name: N/D
Job Title: HRD-Hd of Human Resource Business Partners
Job/Team Function: The Principal HR Business Partner provides the professional focus for the HR Business Partner function both internally within MOD and across the Civil Service.

Name: N/D
Job/Team Function: Head of DCP-Corporate Capability is responsible for the management of the Senior Civil Service

Name: N/D
Job/Team Function: Head of DCP-Employment Framework is responsible for Civilian HR policy relating to conditions of service for all civilian employees, coordination of work with TSol and CLS in connection with Employment Tribunal and other employment related Litigation.

Name: Stephen Love
Job Title: Chief Constable MoD Police & Guarding Agency
Job/Team Function: The MDP Chief Constable is responsible (as Chief Executive of the Ministry of Defence, Policing and Guarding Agency) for the delivery of effective Policing and Guarding in support of the UK's Defence capability.

Name: N/D
Job/Team Function: Deputy Chief Constable MDP is responsible for the delivery of specialised civilian policing services to MOD establishments in the UK, both military and civilian, inclusive of armed guarding and suppoort to national critical infrastructure.

Name: N/D
Job/Team Function: Head of Unarmed Guarding is responsible for the MOD Guard Service (MGS) whose role is to provide unarmed guarding and access control services to MOD units across the UK.

Name: N/D
Job/Team Function: The Agency Secretary MDPGA is responsible for providing Financial, Secretarial, Parliamentary and other Corporate service assistance and advice to the Chief Constable/Chief Executive of the MDPGA and other senior colleagues

Name: Mark Preston
Job/Team Function: Director Business Resilience (DBR) is the Process Owner for Security and Business Continuity and supports 2nd PUS as Process Owner for Health, Safety, Environmental Protection and Sustainable Development.

Name: N/D
Job/Team Function: Head of Defence Security (DBR-DefSY) is responsible for developing, promulgating and monitoring the Department’s protective security policy and standards.

Name: N/D
Job Title: DBR-Head of Safety, Sustainable Development & Continuity Policy
Job/Team Function: Head of Safety, Sustainable Development & Continuity (DBR-SSD&C) is the policy lead for Safety, Sustainable Development, Environmental Protection and Business Continuity.

Name: N/D
Job Title: DBR-Head of Common Law Claims & Policy
Job/Team Function: Head of DBR-Common Law Claims & Policy (DBR-CLC&P) is primarily responsible for processing common law, non-contractual, compensation claims against and on behalf of the MOD at home and overseas.

Name: Surg V Adm P Raffaelli
Job/Team Function: This post is HQ Surgeon General and his role is the Process Owner for Defence Healthcare and the Provider of Medical Operational Capability.

Name: Maj Gen S Andrews
Job Title: SG - Director of Strategy and Change
Job/Team Function: This post is a member of the senior executive team with the HQ Surgeon General and HQ Joint Medical Command.
